text.data: Chapter 5 Emperor Sauzer[end]
Matelite: Sauzer! Why have you brought [character][0x1] to such a creepy forest?![end]
Taicho: There are many enemies![end]
They are not human! They are monsters![end]
Lukia: Why did they come to such a dangerous place...[end]

No matter how dangerous it is, there's one thing we must do. Right?
Oops, sorry for interrupting.[end]
Sendak: Hmmm...[end]
Taicho: Let us go![end]
Sendak: Oh! Now I remember![end]
Sendak: There is a Holy Dragon in this forest! The sense in the air here... It is the same as Bahamut's in Kahna![end]
Matelite: Fine, whatever![end]
Matelite: While we're standing around here, [character][0x1]'s...[end]
Matelite: It doesn't matter what the Empire is thinking! We're going to get [character][0x1] back![end]
Matelite: Alright, let's go! Follow me![end]

Sendak: The presence of a Holy Dragon...
Princess...[end]
Lukia: I hope we find [character][0x1] this time...[end]
Battlefield salesman: You're always hard at work. Well, please have a look![end]
Show me weapons. Show me armor. Show me items.[end1]
Bikkebakke: I found some mushrooms. I think I'll try growing them in [character][0x1].[end]
Bikkebakke: [0x2a]mumble[0x2a] [0x2a]mumble[0x2a] Are we going to attack?[end]
Wait a little bit more! Call the dragons! Attack![end1]
Bikkebakke: Oh, good. That gives me time to find some more mushrooms.[end]
Bikkebakke: Alright, let's go![end]
Matelite: [0x2a]pant[0x2a] ......[end]
Taicho: Quickly! The enemy is strong![end]
[0x2a]mumble[0x2a] [0x2a]mumble[0x2a] They're all here.[end][end]
